law.catch_line: Each employee in the State Personnel Management System, except a temporary employee, is entitled to ...

text.section:
Each employee in the State Personnel Management System, except a temporary employee, is entitled to work-related accident leave with sick pay if:
the employee sustains a disabling personal injury that would be compensable under the Maryland Workers' Compensation Act; and
a physician examines the employee and certifies that the employee is disabled because of the injury.
The appointing authority of an employee entitled to work-related accident leave shall notify the employee of the employee's right to file a claim with the Workers' Compensation Commission.
